name: Teddy and Iggy
description:
Teddy and Iggy is a memory game for young children.

It contains three mini-games:
  • Iggy's Boxes: Iggy the caterpillar opens 5 boxes to reveal prizes. The player must remember which order they were opened.

  • Teddy's Bed: the player watches Teddy make his bed, and then must chose the order it was made.

  • Teddy Shapes Up: Teddy stack three shapes, and the player must show which order they were stacked.
